title: Reinforcing the Symmetry of Stripping/plating Behavior via In-situ Interface Construction for Long-lasting Zinc Metal Batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE03102D, Paper
Dongmin Li, Yunpeng Zhong, Xieyu Xu, Daren Zhou, Yan Tang, Liangbing Wang, Shuquan Liang, Bingan Lu, Yangyang Liu, Jiang Zhou
Zn metal batteries (ZBs) are considered promising candidates for next-generation energy storage systems. Cyclic reversibility of ZBs is strictly associated with the interfacial evolution of the Zn anode during the...
